    Ph.D student at CISPA Helmholtz Center for Information Security

    Biography

    I am a first-year Ph.D student at CISPA Helmholtz Center for Information Security. My advisor is Dr. Yang Zhang. Prior to that, I obtained my bachelor(2017) and master(2020) degrees from Fudan University under the supervision of Prof. Yang Chen。

    Research Interests

    • Machine Learning Privacy
    • User Behavior Modeling in Social Networks


    Education
